attributes.action: Petition for Ionad Spòrs Leòdhais to open earlier during the week.
attributes.additional_details: We would like the local sports centre to open earlier than the present 8am to give people the chance to get some exercise before going to work. A survey of mainland sports centre's shows that on average they open at 6.30am/7am. This would also give young people the chance of improving their sporting abilities.
